channel.title: Ssh on Hack Me Daddy

item.title: Rebuilding My Homelab In NixOS (Part 2) Enabling SSH Login in NixOS
item.description:
This is part 2 of my series demonstrating my rebuild of my homelab in NixOS. If you would like to see the initial creation of the VM on Proxmox please see Part 1 .

First Login to NixOS:

Lets start off where we left off in the last section, and we will login to the NixOS host for the first time.

As we are using Proxmox our first login will be via using the console, use the credentials you provided in the VM creation.
